name: hayday-bot
description: Discord Bot that helps coordinate Hayday things.

scripts.build: npm i esbuild --save-dev && rm -rf dist && esbuild ./src/*.js --entry-names=[dir]/[name] --bundle --platform=node --target=node16.14 --outdir=dist && cp dist/*.js commands/
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/ function.zip ; npm i --only=prod && zip -r function.zip ./*

author: Tricky Wheat
